item.title: local storage
item.description: Overview APIs API Description SetItem, SetItemAsync Store a value in LocalStorage GetItem, GetItemAsync Retrieve a value based on a key ContainKey, ContainKeyAsync Check if a key exists RemoveItem, RemoveItemAsync Remove a value from LocalStorage ILocalStorage @inject Blazored.LocalStorage.ILocalStorageService localStorage var firstName = await localStorage.GetItemAsync<string>("EmployeeFirstName");
